meanings.definition: Make (something) more difficult or confusing by causing it to be more complex.
meanings.sent1: Adding too many steps complicates the process.
meanings.sent2: Using too many ingredients complicates the recipe.
meanings.sent3: Trying to juggle too many tasks complicates the day.
meanings.sent4: Overthinking can complicate even the simplest decisions.
meanings.sent5: The maze of rules and regulations complicates understanding.

meanings.definition: Introduce complications or difficulties into (a situation).
meanings.sent1: His sudden arrival complicates our plans.
meanings.sent2: The unexpected rain complicates our outdoor event.
meanings.sent3: The mix-up with the tickets complicates our travel.
meanings.sent4: The new information complicates our strategy.
meanings.sent5: The power outage complicates our work schedule.
